question: 待遇
sourceMnemonic: Just because you have to <kanji>wait</kanji> for special <kanji>treatment</kanji> doesn't mean it's not still good <vocabulary>treatment</vocabulary>. And just because everyone didn't cheer when you arrived, doesn't mean you're getting a cold <vocabulary>reception</vocabulary>, you know? Maybe they're planning a surprise party for you or something... yeah.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
